title: My Mom Can't Cope with How My Sister Died
description:
How can Diane help her mother recognize that taking her sister off life support was necessary and not a mistake? - Dr. Laura: "Hug your mom and say, “I miss her too.”

Do you feel you made a mistake? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
